item.title: Fedora touchpad not working in laptop
item.description: [Solved] Fedora 32 touchpad not working Last week I installed Fedora to get the other side of distos. From the beginning I have been with the Debain family. Tried Ubuntu, Debian & linux Mint. Now Fedora 32 installed nicely on my laptop. Specification: Dell Latitude 3380 Memory : 8 GB Processor : Intel Core i3-6006U CPU @ 2.00 GHz Disk: 500 GB Type: 64 bits The problem The touchpad didn’t work after installing Fedora 32.
